about: Dedicated and accomplished Software Engineer with over 7 years of experience in the IT industry, specializing in front-end heavy full-stack development using ReactJS, TypeScript, JavaScript, Java and web technologies. Proven track record of leading successful projects, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and delivering high-quality solutions. Passionate about mentoring and contributing to the growth of junior developers.

workNotes: Led front-end development for License & Permits Manager, delivering for 14 markets on an accelerated timeline.
Developed and maintained License & Permits Manager Tool, optimizing license procurement and renewal flow.
Utilized React JS, JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.js, Redux, and Saga to create an intuitive, efficient user interface.
Implemented Progressive Web App (PWA) concept, enhancing mobile usability and development efficiency.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and implement user-friendly features.
Mentored junior developers, fostering a culture of continuous learning and growth.
Actively participated in design discussions and conducted code reviews for consistent code quality.
Developed robust, scalable, and API-centric infrastructures.
